features: Alcohol-Free AHA Thayers Facial Toner: Introducing Thayers 2% AHA Toner, a smoothing and pore refining toner featuring the finest natural ingredients. This toner exfoliates, smooths uneven skin and refines visible pores

Real Results: This exfoliating face toner refines the appearance of pores in 1 week for better-looking bare skin. For best application, twice daily after cleansing, pour our witch hazel toner onto a cotton pad and smooth over face

96% Natural Origin Ingredients: Our facial toner has been formulated with Glycolic Acid and Lactic Acid and blended with Certified Organic Witch Hazel. This Glycolic Acid toner improves the overall quality of skin texture
Always Alcohol-Free: This alcohol free toner features a very gentle, non-drying, non-comedogenic and cruelty free formula. Our toner for face leaves skin feeling balanced and smooth

Dermatologist-Tested Skin Care: Thayers facial skin care products are dermatologist-tested for safety, cruelty-free and backed by science. We fuse our skincare with natural plant ingredients with derm actives for real results to improve overall skin quality
body.description: Thayers 2% AHA Toner exfoliates, smooths uneven skin and refines visible pores. Our exfoliating toner is formulated with Glycolic Acid and Lactic Acid, acids that are present in our natural botanical extracts and blended with Organic Certified Witch Hazel. This alcohol-free formula is very gentle, non-drying and non-comedogenic. Our facial toner and has been tested by dermatologists for safety. For best application, twice daily after cleansing, pour our Thayers toner onto a cotton pad and smooth over face. Within just 1 week, pores will look more refined for better looking bare skin. Thayers is dermatologist-tested for safety, cruelty free and backed by science for real results to improve overall skin quality. No. 1 Toner Brand based on unit sales of toners as reported by Nielsen for the 52 week period ending 9.16.23.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything it says and more!
reviews.reviewText: Instructions said I would see a difference in one week, but I never dreamed the difference would be this noticeable! Pores are visibly smaller. My face is so smooth and soft. My hubby even commented on how it feels after 1 1/2 weeks. It cleans and tones without drying out this 65 year old face. All I will use from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really good for deep cleansing and exfoliating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described
reviews.reviewText: It does help tighten the face up which shrinks pores some

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay, not great!
reviews.reviewText: I have patches of clogged pores and got this thinking it would remove the dead skin blocking them but this hasn’t made much of a difference.I was expecting more of an astringent and this has a sticky finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm a skincare junkie and this is my holy Grail. It works better than much more expensive products and I hope they never stop making it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is exactly what I have been looking for! I’ve been trying to find something to help with my underarm odor after the gym. A friend mentioned trying a glycolic acid product on my armpits in the morning to help with the smell, so of course I bought some. Thayers is a good, trustworthy brand & just so happened to have a glycolic acid product. I have been applying some product on my underarms daily & it has been a godsend!!Please note: I have sensitive skin & this was a GREAT alternative for the chemical filled deodorants you can buy at the store! I have tried tons & TONS of deodorants in the past (womens, mens, spray, gel, etc.) & NONE have worked as well or as fast as this!!! This product doesn’t necessarily do anything to help with sweat, but it takes away the odor completely.This product not only contains glycolic acid (which is great for your sensitive skin areas), but it also contains witch hazel & lactic acids which are some of the best acids to use for your underarms. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stops Body Odor
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a last ditch effort to keep up with natural deodorant. For years I've tried every big brand with zero luck. Even right out of the shower, after scrubbing with soap, I still feel like my body odor is there. I read somewhere that glycolic acid toner could help, so I figured I'd give this a try. I had this overnighted, tried it this morning by applying right after the shower, used my natural deodorant, and no kidding 12 hours later I smell fresh!! I had a really active day running around outdoors and am ending my day feeling and smelling clean. It's incredible. If you're suffering from body odor try this.
